thread.title: BRIEF-Ask SA H1 net loss group share widens to 6.8 million euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Ask SA H1 net loss group share widens to 6.8 million euros

title: BRIEF-Ask SA H1 net loss group share widens to 6.8 million euros
text:
BRIEF-Ask SA H1 net loss group share widens to 6.8 million euros Sept 28 
Sept 28 Ask SA : 
* Reports H1 net loss group share of 6.8 million euros ($7.6 million) compared to loss of 2.7 million euros a year ago 
* H1 operating loss is 6.5 million euros compared to 1.4 million euros a year ago 
* H1 EBITDA loss is 3.0 million compared to loss of 0.1 million euros a year ago 
* H1 revenue is 17.7 million euros compared to 20.3 million euros a year ago 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8904 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
